Package com.apple.audio.hardware

Interface Summary
ADevicePropertyListener This interface is implemented when a client is interested in receiving notifications when a property of an AudioDevice is changed.
AHardwarePropertyListener This interface is implemented when a client is interested in receiving notifications when a property of the AudioHardware is changed.
AStreamPropertyListener This interface is implemented by applications to listen for property changes to an AudioStream
AudioDeviceIOProc AudioDeviceIOProc This is a client supplied routine that the hardware calls to do an IO transaction for a given device.
 

Class Summary
AHConstants This class contains constants that are defined in AudioHardware.h
AudioDevice This class represents a single AudioDevice within the audio system.
AudioHardware This class provides static methods to obtain information about the Audio Hardware that is currently available to the running system.
AudioStream Audio Streams are the gate keepers of format information.
